Cookie Policy for review-pokies-club-au.com

This is the cookie policy for review-pokies-club-au.com, available at review-pokies-club-au.com

What are cookies

As is common practice with almost all professional websites, this website uses cookies, which are small files which is downloaded to your computer to enhance your experience. This page describes which information they have collect how we use it and why we sometimes need to store these cookies. We will also share how we can prevent the storage of these cookies, but this may weaken or "break" certain elements the websites cities functionality.

How we use cookies

We use cookies for various reasons described below. Unfortunately, in most cases it is not the industry default options to disable cookies without completely disabling functionality and functions such as they add them to this page. It is recommended to leave all cookies if you are not sure whether you need them or not if they are used to provide the service you are using.

Disable cookies

You can prevent the setting of cookies by adjusting your browser settings (see the browser help to how to do it). Please note that disabling cookies will affect functionality to this and many others websites you visit. Disabling cookies usually also disables certain features and features on this website. It is therefore not recommended to disable cookies.

Information cookies we set

  • Site Settings Cookies

    To ensure you have a good experience on this site, we offer functionality to enter your settings for how this website works when you use it. To remember your preferences, them we have to put cookies so that this information can be retrieved each time you interact with the affected the website your settings.

Third Party Cookies

In some special cases, we also use cookies from trusted third parties. Next section details which third party cookies you may encounter on this website.

  • This website uses Google Analytics, which is one of the most widely used and trusted analytical solutions in the world online because you help us understand how you use the site and how we can improve yours experience. These cookies can track things like how long you spend on the website and which pages you visit them, so we can continue to create interesting content.

    For more information about Google Analytics cookies, see the official Google Analytics page.

More information

We hope that cleared things up for you and as mentioned before if there is anything that you are not sure whether you need them or not, it is usually safer to leave cookies alone enabled in case interactions with one of the features you use on our website.
